content:
Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 27, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft chiseled_nether_bricks, I need to craft 3 nether_brick_slabs. This requires placing 3 nether_bricks in a row, so I will first move one of the nether_bricks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: chiseled_nether_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 25}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 27, "index": 42}]

thought: Since the first nether brick has been placed in the crafting grid, I need to place another nether brick to the right of it. Therefore, I will move the second nether brick from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: The nether bricks have been successfully crafted into nether_brick_slabs. I will move them from the crafting slot (0) to the inventory slot 11, where the rest of the nether bricks were stored.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
